page.title: 10PLAYING FIELD,CARBOST
page.content: Although our village does not have a proper park,there is a field of about half an acre which we use as a play area.It belongs to the Highland Regional Council,who bought it as a site for the new primary school. The local Community Council raised funds to put some equipment in the field such as swings,chute,parrallel bars,see-saw,roundabout and 2 goalposts. The surface is really too uneven and the grass too long for a proper game of football,but when the new school is built in 1987, the field is to be made into a proper sports field for use by the community.
